## RedirectAction type

Action to redirect the user to a different URL when an error occurs. Commonly used for navigation after authentication errors or access denied scenarios.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type RedirectAction = {
    action: 'redirect';
    payload: {
        redirectURL: string;
        [key: string]: any;
    };
};
```

## Example


```typescript
{
  action: 'redirect',
  payload: {
    redirectURL: '/login',
    delay: 2000,
    replace: true,
  }
}
```
